name: Tiny Gems
description:
* About *
Tiny Gems is a small retro game. Your goal is to complete levels by collecting enough diamonds for the door to open. While you collect the gems you have to avoid hazards such as spiders and boulders.

Play time ranges from 20-30 minutes.
Unless you are willing to get creative!

* Features of the game *
- 30 levels
- A level editor to create custom levels, with the ability to share your creations using a mega.nz account.
- Basic controller support (Editor and text fields are not supported yet)
- 5 Achievements to unlock

*Credits*
